attributes.action: Reject Simon Watson as a Captain of the P.I.G.S.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the overbearing and repetitive  manner of the aforementioned, we trust our leader of the country will see common sense and reject the whinging, facebooking and general moaning of him not being made a P.I.G.S. captain before muskie pickles.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
